capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to Harry and he's definitely wearing glasses. I'm quite sure about it, actually. He looked pretty confident in them too, which makes sense since they're really good for his eyesight.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to Harry and he's definitely wearing glasses. I'm quite certain about it, actually. He looked pretty confident in his specs too, which is good because they're really helping him see things clearly.
